issue.title: [CF 343] Sound Interface - Sound Path overflowing
issue.body:
What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The path of the sound is overflowing it's boundary and extend up to the default list of sound. The behaviour should be the same as in 4.6.5 where the path of the sound was limited to the Event Box.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.6.6

Image of the problem - http://tinypic.com/r/2dafxc1/5


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura | Imported from CurseForge issue #343 | Raw
